text: Cornelius Alvin Smith (born 7 April 1937)Profile of Cornelius A. Smith is a Bahamian politician. He was the 10th Governor-General of the Bahamas from 28 June 2019 to 1 September 2023. Smith was the Ambassador to the United States starting in 2008. He was also Minister of Transport, and Aviation of the Bahamas. In 2018, he was sworn in as the deputy Governor General. ==References== Category:1937 births Category:Living people Category:Governors- General of the Bahamas Category:Ambassadors to the United States
title: Cornelius A. Smith
